activities: PDHI develops and delivers software that enables its clients to provide effective workplace wellness and population health management programs. The EU personal information collected during the operation of these programs will be used to provide health status reports to participants, schedule coaching sessions, deliver wellness programs, events and challenges, interact online with coaches, and track and deliver incentives. Health coaches will access risk stratification and health record data for targeted interventions, to better document encounters and measure individual results. Program administrators will target, initiate and manage programs, track progress, and measure program results.
personaldata: online; health status, health risk, biometrics, wellness program and health services data
recoursemech: The Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedure administered by the Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.
